Package foragingBee

Interface Summary
IAgentLocator This interface defines methods agents will expect from the simulation environment.
IMovingAgent An interface for setting and retrieving information about a moving agent.
 

Class Summary
AbstractMovingAgent An abstract class for a moving object.
AbstractSphericAgent This class implements an agent that can draw itself as a sphere.
Bee This class defines the behaviour of the bee inside this simulation.
FoodSource This class simulates a food source.
Hive A class simulating the hive.
HiveEntrance This class simulates the entrance of a hive.
Obstacle A class representing a simple obstacle.
 

Enum Summary
Bee.State The states the bee can cycle through.
